summary: Adds a small village at in Dawnstar, the marker will be shown on the map, you can fast travel there as soon as you install you mod. The mod also adds an NPC called Edward, he is located in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml: Adds a small village at in Dawnstar, the marker will be shown on the map, you can fast travel there as soon as you install you mod. The mod also adds an NPC called Edward, he is located in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. I have also forgot to mention, there's books in the village I added. Under the Skyforge there's a place called The Underforge, there's a book in there. You need to be a werewolf (not in werewolf form) to enter it. Also you need to have completed the Companion quests to enter.
author: WolfGum also known as LynxGaming1507
